remarks: Equal spans of singletons must have proportional vectors.  See ~ lspsnss2 for comparable span version.  TODO: can proof be shortened? (Contributed by NM, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lspsneq.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsneq.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lspsneq.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
lspsneq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lspsneq.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lspsneq.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsneq.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsneq.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsneq.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsneq $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { X } ) = ( N ` { Y } ) <-> E. k e. ( K \ { .0. } ) X = ( k .x. Y ) ) ) $.
$d .0. k $.
$d .x. k $.
$d K k $.
$d X k $.
$d Y k $.
